aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: This aspect model defines the standard for demand and capacity notification exchange between business partners. Demand and Capacity Notifications refer to specific events within the supply chain which affect production or demand.
The affected Business Partner Site Numbers of the sender of the notification. It is RECOMMENDED to set this property.
The affected Business Partner Site Numbers of the recipient of the notification. It is RECOMMENDED to set this property. It MUST NOT contain any BPNS that doesn't belong to the receiver.

aas:langStringNameType.aas:text: UUID of the Part Type Twin

aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: Identifier used uniquely to identify part type twin.

aas:langStringNameType.aas:text: UUID of the Part Type Twin

aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: Material identifiers as assigned by the supplier or manufacturer. This property identifies the material in the supplier's database. If the supplier is the data provider, sending this property is RECOMMENDED.

Material identifier as assigned by the customer. This property identifies the material in the customer's database. For standard materials (e.g. screws) for which a customer does not have an own ID, the manufacturer material ID should be set in this field, too. If the customer is the data provider, sending this property is RECOMMENDED.

This aspect model defines the standard for demand and capacity notification exchange between business partners. Demand and Capacity Notifications refer to specific events within the supply chain which affect production or demand.

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: This aspect model defines the standard for demand and capacity notification exchange between business partners. Demand and Capacity Notifications refer to specific events within the supply chain which affect production or demand.
The affected Business Partner Site Numbers of the sender of the notification. It is RECOMMENDED to set this property.
The affected Business Partner Site Numbers of the recipient of the notification. It is RECOMMENDED to set this property. It MUST NOT contain any BPNS that doesn't belong to the receiver.
The main cause that has or may have an impact on the supply of goods.

Effect or impact on the supply of goods as a consequence mentioned in the leadingRootCause. From business perspective demand/capacity reduction are most relevant values in connection with mentioned root causes. For technical completeness demand/capacity increase are also added to the enumeration.
Free text description for notification (max. 4000 characters).

aas:langStringNameType.aas:text: UUID of the Part Type Twin

aas:langStringPreferredNameTypeIec61360.aas:text: UUID of the Part Type Twin

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: Identifier used uniquely to identify part type twin.
This property defines the start date and time of the effect regardless of the time the notification was sent.
Expected end date of the impact MAY be defined by the sender of the notification.

Status "open" should be used in the context of an effect which remains active. Status "resolved" should be used to inform the partner that the effect of the initial notification stopped or has been resolved.
The timestamp of the latest change of this notification. Date and time are set according to a timezone.
Unique ID identifying a source notification related to the current one.

Material identifiers as assigned by the supplier or manufacturer. This property identifies the material in the supplier's database. If the supplier is the data provider, sending this property is RECOMMENDED.

Material identifier as assigned by the customer. This property identifies the material in the customer's database. For standard materials (e.g. screws) for which a customer does not have an own ID, the manufacturer material ID should be set in this field, too. If the customer is the data provider, sending this property is RECOMMENDED.
Unique ID identifying a previously received notification triggering the exchange of the current notification.
